attributes.title: this doesn’t work
attributes.review:
My app is lagging. I keep seeing a racist, sexist, transphobic, homophobic, misogynistic man pop up in the pictures. Surly, he can’t be the President of the US, right? Perhaps someone hacked the app. Pleas help!
Best regards,
an American citizen <3

attributes.title: HORRIBLE🤮

attributes.title: the worst
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep up with what’s happening, then i find out that tiktok is getting taken down. my daughter is VERY upset. fix. this.

Ever since I downloaded this app I keep getting viruses on my iPhone and I keep getting Donald trump supporters on my fyp on TikTok ever since I downloaded this app and I HATE IT but once I deleted it my fyp went to normal , sincerely Gen Z❤️

attributes.title: Horrible
